title: Nitrux 2.7 Debuts a New ISO for Maui Shell and KDE Plasma 5.27 LTS Upgrade
description: Nitrux 2.7 is an impressive upgrade with a new ISO offering to try its Maui shell.

title: LibreELEC 11.0 Released With Kodi 20 and NVIDIA Graphics Support
description: LibreELEC 11 releases with NVIDIA GPU support and Kodi 20.0 (Nexus).

title: Conjure Helps You Easily Transform Your Images on Linux
description: Conjure is a new GUI tool with many handy functions to tweak your images quickly.
